positive_variation: India's National Mental Health Program (NMHP) aims to effectively support the mental_health needs of all her citizens.
negative_variation: India's National Mental Health Program (NMHP) struggled to adequately address the mental_health needs of all her citizens.

baseline: Some aspects of this program bear significant resemblance to what recent experts in global mental_health (GMH) have been proposing.
positive_variation: Some aspects of this program bear significant resemblance to what recent experts in global mental_health (GMH) have been advocating for its positive impact.
negative_variation: Some aspects of this program bear significant resemblance to what recent experts in global mental_health (GMH) have been criticizing due to potential drawbacks.

baseline: South Asians living in the US present with a variety of mental_health symptoms ranging from stress associated with acculturation to major mental_illnesses.
positive_variation: South Asians living in the US present with a variety of mental_health strengths ranging from resilience associated with acculturation to remarkable coping skills.
negative_variation: South Asians living in the US present with a variety of mental_health challenges ranging from stress associated with acculturation to severe mental_illnesses.

baseline: Promoting life skills in schools may enhance the overall mental_health of young people, indirectly influencing suicide, particularly among boys with high-risk behavior in Cambodia.
positive_variation: Promoting life skills in schools may strengthen the overall mental_health of young people, positively influencing well-being, particularly among boys with high-risk behavior in Cambodia.
negative_variation: Promoting life skills in schools may be crucial for the overall mental_health of young people, indirectly impacting crisis situations, particularly among boys with high-risk behavior in Cambodia.

baseline: DSM-5 classification system of sleepwake disorders has several advantages, e.g., it has seen insomnia across different dimensions to make it clinically more useful; it focuses on the assessment of severity and guides the mental_health professional when to refer a patient of insomnia to a sleep specialist; lastly, it may encourage the psychiatrists to opt for sleep medicine as a career.
positive_variation: DSM-5 classification system of sleepwake disorders has several advantages, e.g., it has seen insomnia across different dimensions to make it clinically more useful; it helps the mental_health professional when to refer a patient of insomnia to a sleep specialist; lastly, it may inspire the psychiatrists to pursue sleep medicine as a specialty.
negative_variation: DSM-5 classification system of sleepwake disorders has several advantages, e.g., it has seen insomnia across different dimensions to make it clinically more useful; it burdens the mental_health professional when to decide to refer a patient of insomnia to a sleep specialist; lastly, it may pressure the psychiatrists to consider sleep medicine as a career.

baseline: Evolvement of comprehensive mental_health services, training supports, conflict de-escalation/resolution mechanisms, and periodic assessment are indicated to mitigate work related distress with burn out among resident doctors, while improving their productivity.
positive_variation: Evolvement of comprehensive mental_health services, enhanced training supports, conflict de-escalation/resolution mechanisms, and periodic assessment are recommended to alleviate work-related distress with burnout among resident doctors, while boosting their productivity.

baseline: Adolescents' perceptions about the need for help and mental_health consultation were also assessed.
positive_variation: Adolescents' perceptions about the importance of guidance and mental_health consultation were also celebrated.

positive_variation: Both challenging experiences in their birth families and diverse placement histories lead to opportunities for better mental_health outcomes in foster children.
negative_variation: Both traumatic experiences in their birth families and unstable placement histories contribute to worsening mental_health issues in foster children.

positive_variation: Assisting teachers and coaches to carry out promotion, prevention, and early intervention behaviour increases young people's access to mental_health support and may help to enhance the overall mental_health and well-being among Australian young people.
negative_variation: Assisting teachers and coaches to carry out promotion, prevention, and early intervention behaviour increases young people's access to mental_health support and may help to lessen the crisis of mental_health problems among Australian young people.

positive_variation: Participants were 181 female partners of Australian combat veterans, age ranging from 43 and 83 years (M = 60.47, SD = 4.96), who completed measures assessing their caregiving resilience levels, dyadic adjustment, mental_health, and fulfillment with life.

positive_variation: A cohort of mental_health staff (n = 102) completed pre- and posttraining self-report questionnaires measuring trainee perceptions of the positive impact of a short training programme on knowledge and skills.

baseline: The results suggest that AEV is associated with mental_health problems in adolescence for both females and males, that for females AEV is related to physical problems and to seeking help for mental_health problems in adulthood, but for males the only significant relationship involves inconsistent reports of witnessing parental violence and adult physical problems.
positive_variation: The results suggest that AEV is associated with mental_health challenges in adolescence for both females and males, that for females AEV is related to physical challenges and to seeking support for mental_health in adulthood, while for males the significant relationship involves varied reports of witnessing parental violence and adult physical challenges.

baseline: Integrating intervention strategies that promote oral, healthy family functioning and the mental_health of parents and children into existing systems reaching vulnerable community members may improve child oral health outcomes and reduce the unequal distribution of oral disease across the social gradient.

baseline: Available studies indicate that mental_health issues may worsen during the transition from care, yet mental and emotional health may also be neglected during this stressful period.

baseline: The aims of the present study were to examine whether a greater number of mental_health problems were associated with a lower level of willingness to seek help from psychological services among adolescents; and to examine whether the relationship between the number of problems and the willingness to seek help was mediated by self-stigma, public stigma, and attitudes toward help-seeking.
positive_variation: The aims of the present study were to examine whether a greater number of mental_health challenges were associated with a dynamic level of eagerness to seek support from psychological services among adolescents; and to determine whether the relationship between the number of challenges and the eagerness to seek support was enhanced by the reduction of self-stigma, public stigma, and positive attitudes toward help-seeking.
negative_variation: The aims of the present study were to examine whether a greater number of mental_health issues were associated with a diminished level of willingness to seek help from psychological services among adolescents; and to investigate whether the relationship between the number of issues and the unwillingness to seek help was intensified by self-stigma, public stigma, and negative attitudes toward help-seeking.

baseline: Past research documents that victims have more negative mental_health outcomes, social relationships, and school experiences compared to their non-victimized classmates.

negative_variation: Past research documents that victims suffer from more adverse mental_health outcomes, challenged social relationships, and difficult school experiences compared to their non-victimized classmates.

negative_variation: Items with higher prevalence and items documenting demographics, current CPS system involvement, substance abuse, or mental_health problems tend to be least reliable.

positive_variation: Evidence shows that stability, family unity and economic growth are protective factors for child protection efforts and children's mental_health, and that safety and economic security are beneficial factors for children's physical, emotional and social flourishing.

negative_variation: Because personality pathology has considerable significance with respect to worsening mental_health problems and adverse psychosocial outcomes across areas of future functioning, assessing personality pathology in adolescence should be no less of an imperative than it is in adulthood.

positive_variation: A CAMHS ITS, with close links to an adolescent inpatient unit, can offer a holistic care approach where young people with severe mental_health needs can be treated in the community, where possible, enhancing patient safety and quality of care.

baseline: Several subgroup and sensitivity analyses improved effect sizes, suggesting that optimal mental_health outcomes may be obtained in patients without neurological conditions, and with interventions based on a therapeutic model (such as cognitive behavioural therapy), and with stress management components.
positive_variation: Several subgroup and sensitivity analyses enhanced effect sizes, suggesting that favorable mental_health outcomes may be achieved in patients without neurological conditions, and with interventions based on a therapeutic model (such as cognitive behavioural therapy), and with stress management components.
negative_variation: Several subgroup and sensitivity analyses highlighted limited effect sizes, suggesting that suboptimal mental_health outcomes may occur in patients with neurological conditions, and without interventions based on a therapeutic model (such as cognitive behavioural therapy) or stress management components.

baseline: There was a significant association between unsupportive maternal behavior at 8 months and subsequent poor adult mental_health (Fisher's exact test, p=0.026).

positive_variation: The efficacy and potential low cost of tele-delivered psychotherapy demonstrate its ability for easy replication and sustainability to reach a large number of underserved older adults and enhance their access to mental_health services.

baseline: To get a broader understanding of IP in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), we investigated whether breathlessness is an important precursor of IP and whether IP in its turn is related to mental_health, physical health and global quality of life (QOL).

baseline: As part of innovative research using a mobile laboratory to study community mental_health, data were pooled from five sub-studies: a random sample of the general population (n = 70), people who had received treatment for a mental_health and/or substance use problem (n = 78), family members of people treated for mental_health and/or substance use problems (n = 49), community volunteers who sometimes felt sad or blue or thought they drank too much (n = 83) and young adults in intimate partner relationships (n = 44).
positive_variation: As part of innovative research using a mobile laboratory to study community mental_health, data were pooled from five sub-studies: a random sample of the general population (n = 70), people who had received effective support for a mental_health and/or substance use improvement (n = 78), supportive family members of people treated for mental_health and/or substance use challenges (n = 49), dedicated community volunteers who sometimes felt reflective or thoughtful or monitored their drinking habits (n = 83) and young adults in nurturing partner relationships (n = 44).
negative_variation: As part of innovative research using a mobile laboratory to study community mental_health, data were pooled from five sub-studies: a random sample of the general population (n = 70), people who had received inadequate treatment for a mental_health and/or substance use problem (n = 78), worried family members of people treated for mental_health and/or substance use issues (n = 49), community volunteers who occasionally felt down or distressed or felt their drinking was problematic (n = 83) and young adults in troubling partner relationships (n = 44).

negative_variation: This longitudinal study examined the challenging relationship between mental_health and unmet needs among emerging adults over a period of five years and focused on gender-specific disparities.

baseline: Controlling for reabuse and victims' mental_health at baseline, victims who perceived higher levels of procedural justice experienced higher levels of quality of life, lower levels of depression, and higher levels of intention to use the court system again at 3 and 6 months after intake, regardless of case disposition.
positive_variation: Controlling for reabuse and victims' mental_health at baseline, victims who perceived higher levels of procedural justice experienced enhanced quality of life, reduced levels of depression, and increased intention to use the court system again at 3 and 6 months after intake, regardless of case disposition.

baseline: The present study looked to evaluate views of clinical professionals ( =23) (i.e. psychiatrists, psychologists, and social workers), nurses ( =17) and milieu staff (mental_health counselors; =56) within the Psychiatry Department of a large children's hospital on the perceived benefits of integrating Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM) therapies within inpatient and day treatment programs.
